sentences.sContent: Trading was carried out under a barter system.
sentences.sCn: 当时的贸易是物物交换。

synos.tran: 进行易货贸易；[贸易]作物物交换；讨价还价
易货贸易；[贸易]物物交换；实物交易

remMethod.val: bar(酒吧) + ter → 人们通常在酒吧谈交易 → 实物交易

trans.tranCn: 实物交易， 以物易物
trans.tranOther: to exchange goods, work, or services for other goods or services rather than for money
